name: Mafia Bowling
description:
Play bowling just like in real life from your own home without getting COVID-19 🤣

Using our awesome Virtual Reality bowling game. 🎳

Yeah, you heard it right! ❤️

✔️ Feel just like in a real bowling club due to our realistic physics

✔️ Freely move everywhere you want and order drinks from the bar to gain powers

✔️ Easily play online with your friends with just a few clicks

All this without:

❌ Complicated menus and settings

❌ Annoying game commentators

❌ Restricted movements

❌ Unrealistic physics

❌ Boredness or lack of fun

Coming soon:

🗓️ Play pool, darts, ping pong and more when you wanna take a break 

🗓️ Make new friends by playing online multiplayer

If that’s what you are looking for...

Then see you inside knocking down some pins 💪

Anyway, good luck with that first strike!
